cmp: 车 (car/a vehicle/machine/to shape with a lathe, vehicle on land)
mng: dizzy, halo, ring around moon or sun
confused, dizzy, giddy, to faint, to swoon, to lose consciousness, to pass out

exm.mng: vertigo, dizziness, fainting, feeling of swaying, head spinning, lack of balance or floating (e.g. from a stroke)
to faint, to swoon, to black out, to become unconscious
to faint with blurred vision (idiom); dizzy and eyes dimmed
